title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when using SWT.MULTI
description: When selecting SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText, a beep sound is heard. It seems that this behavior is not intended.
OB: The application should not emit any sound when choosing the SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText.
EB: Currently, there is a Windows 'ding' sound played when selecting SWT.MULTI, indicating an error. This sound should not be played.
SR: Investigate the cause of the beep sound when SWT.MULTI is selected in ControlExampleText. Update the code to eliminate this sound and ensure proper functioning of ControlExampleText with SWT.MULTI option.
